tool_description: Global live on board vessels information.
name: Vessel Data
title: Vessel Data

api_list.name: Get Vessel Photo
api_list.description:
Image of vessel based on given ship id.
*Image might not be display correctly here due to base64 issue of Test Endpoint, but it work indeed.*

api_list.name: Get All Vessels
api_list.description:
Return all available on board vessels.
Visit our [demo site](https://core-api.net/vessel/map.html)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vessel-data.p.rapidapi.com/get_all_vessels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vessel-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vessel-data.p.rapidapi.com/get_all_vessels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vessel-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Vessel Info
api_list.description:
Individual on board vessel info based on given ship id.
Visit our [demo site](https://core-api.net/vessel/map.html)

required_parameters.name: shipid
required_parameters.description:
Ship ID which included in list return by **Get All Vessels** or **Get Vessels by Area** method.
e.g "SHIP_ID": "410553"

api_list.name: Get Vessels by Geo Position
api_list.description:
Return available vessels within 300 nautical miles radius of the given geo coordinate.
Visit our [demo site](https://core-api.net/vessel/map.html)

api_list.name: Get Vessels by Ship Name
api_list.description:
Return vessels by its name.
Visit our [demo site](https://core-api.net/vessel/map.html)
